feed.title: Prowlarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.17.2.4511
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 2c5f2187c88af5976c4cd3f14736bf0844c12f17 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 401ef88971e2572663fff4e88e5af53b48f924e1 Refactor PasswordInput to use type password
  • 4fb3754048634381f226205fd9acd615154bf911 Fixed: Text color for inputs on login page
  • 596efe8fb0f99a4ece555c0f3ce6e5b44ba883ca New: Dark theme for login screen
  • 076a4f2574a4bd83665182933340505080e45b77 Fix class name for AppIndexerMapRepository
  • 9561371a47f118bd161652a9243a51fb4ba23667 Automated API Docs update
  • 16254cf5f915602e398312a2300bde3f8a99c34c New: Option to select download client when multiple of the same type are configured
  • 649a03e5a09fe8a2d25da49281c45141d0320a18 New: Config file setting to disable log database (#2123)
  • dd21d9b521b37ce92f85a6aac3989a60ccf5e67b Fixed: Allow decimals for Seed Ratio
  • 68b895d2ad074de2a3b267039c1cfe4797fc18be Fixed: Don't share settings for same cached definition in CardigannRequestGenerator
See More * 634016ae1bfce61640c6e98704ff7920ba5cc4a4 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 83c6751847f75ff487f0d88128c130fa06294323 Forward X-Forwarded-Host header * 04bb0c51b1b45fcc7f99d07ad4723ef7a55ca89b New: Optionally use Environment Variables for settings in config.xml * d2e9621de946b9f01268d92f7533d7920286bae0 Bump version to 1.17.2 * cb673ddc42df406ad9779481a7b5ae13e41f0649 New: Host column in history and more info * 440618f2b6aa7ec05b9e7f07689558864e515b9e Fixed: Initialize databases after app folder migrations * ae79d456649361e1003035416aac182aa6aadd98 Update Sentry SDK add features * 1877ccb51341e92fee8361f374ef4ce4d90cab31 Update Pull Request Labeler config for v5 * b3098f2e4c79181da71c05186f19f63a314f0f21 Use newer Node.js task for in pipelines * 3e0af062c12728686c362489ff717feca69def60 Parameter binding for API requests * 858f85c50d4492cdeb3ab893d870ab3896e7a751 Fix translations for proxy validation * 938848be6556d3281ef2fc3b2b61042c3bccc714 (ci): update action version * 615f5899cc034de45021e2ef168daf568b6c9a24 Fixed: (TorrentDay) Update base urls and MST * 5a6b1313e8147c0b37bca00fae2c2cdb06674e4d Validate that folders in paths don't start or end with a space * ab7debb34b98a65512c174f62526797d359e451e Improve paths longer than 256 on Windows failing to hardlink * eee21de79585c0a8306491d2eafaa7fd627ccb0e Fixed: Handle download redirects to magnet links * 15fabbe7d087b3696a14795d9bb7c7cd2ee04628 Bump version to 1.17.1 * 6aef48c6e733725e77d7e918311abe7db5fd0c7b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * b29bc923fc870b9f2c0582ca20db0d16adb541d5 Fixed: Don't reset sorting, columns and selected filter on clear releases [ #2112 ] * b223e9b0cca53aa4362a2abb09e44e51d16cbada Should not empty install folder, MirrorFolder will take care of it. * 77a982a7dadea51b95db3b813fa31f7272509165 Fixed: Retrying download on not suppressed HTTP errors * ab3dc765b42989c7147a6085d6ddb13200604b96 Database corruption message linking to wiki * 0261201360ae7eb7d8feb1751cf3afeb3deb7184 Fixed: (GazelleGames) Update categories * 1da3954879184098d7605b13d428a62c6b2986f4 New: (GazelleGames) Freeleech only option * 742dd5ff54a9fb95d66d96e2c7933b1d62aacd2d Update BTN tests * a85406e3b7871fac37b9bb506d2d83ba15848d4e Fixed: (BroadcasTheNet) Append wildcard when searching for single episodes * 73cdaf3d4487ac84cc6e3faaa45c569de3838a54 Bump NUnit and Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk * e26fa2dbf4b1256400699125f3cb39fa97375c9a Fixed: (Anidex) Support season and episode for TV searches * 64be68a22d38e7ac24cdc0611e63ad0be37df0ff Bump dotnet to 6.0.29 * 478a18596864bc74c35a406b8bce7c3b15aa71f7 Convert createDimensionsSelector to typescript * 4ff5d11a03eefd84f1287d7f7fb44bc966aee223 Bump frontend dependencies * 6000952b767e11fa5ca0bfc73a56f91d72fcfe5e Bump version to 1.17.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=121&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.18.0.4543
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 6e01f3187a7b37816bcd415edd8f4466325d5aa3 New: (UI) Detailed error message for inner exception in indexers validation
  • 468436b9f79dd68705daedc71617a655158d4dc4 Fixed: Remove extraneous rate limiting for grabs [ #2140 ]
  • 76c288a6e4879bf825833fafe81984d1bb5a5fa0 Fixed: Authentication issues with Cardigann definitions having captcha [ #2139 ]
  • f95f67a7ca3e274cd0b5abbac487eb914fccd0bb New: (Cardigann) Bump minimum version to v10
  • 11864247eb970932a7547ff57a801253a50d91fe Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk and Polly
  • 74509ea7c9f198116983b1c97083b5bb17b92e45 Fixed: (MyAnonamouse) Don't die when no results on paginated queries
  • 948fe0a6dc5795a28fe171b1b89084ba5d6d0fc9 Fixed: Trimming slashes from UrlBase when using environment variable
  • a4257cbcdee421229194102c03148ac9dd6a70fe Bump Npgsql to 7.0.7
  • 2929c3c8980e90c3769565706c591336b5ea5997 Bump version to 1.18.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.19.0.4568
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 55fa1ec637ab9d072b10ec3d7a3c0738f35663e6 Small improvements to IndexerNoDefinitionCheck
  • b27a3d8272e96862d23577074afe408728388743 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 089d450b46bb57d5aa3719ae9ab2f384c3d36cb5 Fixed: (M-Team-TP) New API path
  • 358ac7434d106cabc9a54b9a1034dccf020fc460 Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10
  • 9cd505fd8a52900dffd6532be0e2800254920cf4 Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3
  • 20ac2687df08ccf1931940c2e449b800a0b39fe9 New: Ignore inaccessible folders when getting folders
  • 9f075c09a2c12cedb7e58c9478a7faf4eac8c664 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 3793538ba42bf2ae40f45670de4dca63d08c5b96 Use tooltip component for detailed error message
  • 4c4b16d234a3da2da44fbd470f4a8226f9b3ea4b Fixed: (FileList) Parsing poorly padded IMDb Ids
  • f5790bec2ed68db21b65be4e97d59f2e13a653e8 HD-Space switched to Cardigann YML
See More * 6c0d08de56ceccb8070b8328250831961fae19c6 Fixed: Ignore case for name validation in providers * ba344756b119c1d70c50c502d7192dc095cb8492 Fixed: Improve error messaging if config file isn't formatted correctly * dfda86aca3b2061c5ae20229e0c4e71537a2aaf4 Automated API Docs update * df6f83ed69baf4578e6aa77c87808c28fad5a128 Increase timeout for docs * 218d92a1ac660e8dee03ffed23633ebad9753ade docs: use application specific to platform * df2b529d01a13336571801c87f6f54634f64718c Bump Swashbuckle to 6.6.2 * 0ef42dbb4d583981169110e326b735cce80a1ea3 Display downtime message for Nebulance * 1a428197b2064b39199c58f5e3fcce97320753a5 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 09d7983845236e0b4ea311a1169850d34f2f72f1 Bump version to 1.19.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=128&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.20.1.4603
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 45d8a8a4e63561518d2c94db9c71bf52bf5b265f Minor fixes and cover link for SubsPlease
  • a4546c77ce9dd04bbe5a04faae0ada2690437888 Avoid invalid requests for Nebulance
  • d69bf6360a2b37487cad4682ecb96dcbbc885fad Fixed: (Nebulance) Improve searching by release names
  • da9ce5b5c3434daf2bba126256f34293098426ab New: Enable "Sync Anime Standard Format Search" by default for new Sonarr apps
  • e0920981016bd10b15e45ce27d5e6af8c8bab997 Minor improvements to season parsing from titles for AnimeBytes
  • 1a89a79b747587aa640054b76aeadad4fb36933e Avoid NullRef for missing filelist and tags fields
  • cb6bf499223b80cdc2c42de8dbed7fff8b0c253d New: (Nebulance) Improvements for season and episode searching
  • 4bcaba0be0a2d5a9134025301ae14c70bdc237f3 Fixed: Trimming disabled logs database
  • 220ef723c79ee87710bbfc7e1a9d8f988d1481f7 Bump version to 1.20.1
  • 9c599a6be47fcc819ccef1f0818d501ebffe0241 New: (UI) Indexer privacy label [ #2132 ]
See More * 715ce1fc6c15869acbd10ecb7de5383fe0a23db2 Refresh indexers list and status on page change * 8c3a192dd0dad3d7c919803e9532f382123df331 Fixed: Ignore auth events from queries and grab stats * d22bf93dfdafd73b0aefa223ae2ba31ba57206b6 Fixed: Searches with season/episodes should not be treated as ID searches * 886054fdf8e17e27714a8c41911980fff3550e39 Bump indexers definition version to 11 * 4188510586702f40574cdaaa010710c9e047073f New: (Cardigann) Add `info_category_8000` * fedebca5e1c5178e76bf8ef8d52705b1d1890fee New: (Cardigann) Optional login selectorinputs and getselectorinputs * e2ce6437e94f231bccad8b722cff83faaa7788c2 Bump mac image to 12 * bdae60bac9f3940cc642fed7620321d529b8cd65 Improvements to EnhancedSelectInput * 2d6c818aec2d35cd91d7ed6537396edeb907ce5e Fixed: Exclude invalid releases from Newznab and Torznab parsers * a1d19852dc38914a715b26bad2e2abe5a9fe124c Switch TorrentsCSV to STJson * 104c95f28f49618ef9a9b51750dfa2111dacb5c5 Bump version to 1.20.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=132&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.21.2.4649
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 2f67d2813a3e65cfd0966a52ac393c60735515dd Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 9a7a5fdc38c335dc009c9775d47dde09775bc70f Remove PropTypes
  • f1fdec6822f7f5d3baeddb6d8b8201eb41a4eaf9 Convert Add Indexer Modal to Typescript
  • 5464b23329700b6f697f297b924c48368d318cff Sort indexer queries stats by a sum of all 3 types
  • 4c99971882f2287353cbfbca98e695b9e405dfa4 Improve messaging on no results with applied filter
  • cc7769b601dcdd4f71cdcb10b17c568c124a64ae Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • cb2ed7daf9c64725ef7ce547cc5ce6c9c7312b9c Fixed: Improve elapsed time collecting for grabs
  • 78508094c8eb9c165085ac7612b0cc9c855d058f Bump some frontend libraries
  • b0f755a30ceade3ee74532d6b8c3a4979b631747 Fixed: (Nebulance) Searching for daily episodes using ids
  • 9d1384792aff384bfdf57d134ae1d4c4eb83af0a Bump version to 1.21.2
See More * ea17116998bf69d696977559b8da895af9e7b5c6 Fixed: (Nebulance) Avoid requests for release calls that are 2 characters or fewer * 2c23681fc511d1ac8840b2157aae54b320d4760f Automated API Docs update * 17aa2832eae143dc059b57b378f8081511d4d5db New: Split average response time statistics for queries and grabs * 5f3a329ef208f5101469d5c603ece4d915229ed0 Don't show null for non-cached indexer queries * 96f49da79e2ecde29ebccec32261446a0b709133 New: Improve history details for release grabs * c7dfde0ce99eec2280a92f88a726f3a9b7c61ecb Improve messaging for invalid request for M-Team-TP * 8cf32020f758fd6710ba9670e972a49c965ed490 New: Bump dotnet to 6.0.32 * a5ed5a0e604eefbc2ca1804adce87cf71b0e9b8e Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 3279936fc9cc5fabd8ab3bdc6d0a64bbca5d5497 New: Litestream compatibility for SQLite (#2179) * 8abccc709e0bb79943ef2b24e86f5a35c2889e86 Use natural sorting for remaining lists of items in the UI * 76f30e7682170f8ae5eec17df2f5aa53307aa4fe New: Use natural sorting for lists of items in the UI * ab289b3e420e8750af5ae55148b5fb38f9f3ea0a New: Show update settings on all platforms * ef7e04065c04a8b10c79e5f7fbb156c7bdc7c60e Fixed: (BeyondHD) Don't die on invalid TMDb ids * d1084039b3d9629cfc8a93f2470ddd950ede66e3 Bump version to 1.21.1 * 7bada440d23c309176cef29eee0ee4be0edf9090 Log invalid torrent files contents as debug [ #2169 ] * 803c4752db210999ea55f046434354164beac9ee Fixed: Sending health restored notifications with Gotify [ #2176 ] * c0777474c0d67cd764cf8456a84a6cde5eaf3d64 Bump Polly * 66dcea56041f8d64c87a9d93a8abc754927c9af6 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * a2a12d245000a0713946cec732d853dd7cdc58c2 Update SonarCloud pipeline versions (#2171) * 39593bd5a81ea5e8318210aa2a1c27c331101a4d Bump version to 1.21.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=135&_a=release-summary).
